resources.string: Funny Gay Test
Version %s
Start

Probably the most accurate and interesting gay test you are able to find on the Internet. Scientists from all over the world have been working on it just in order to answer you a delicate question. Prefer boys?\n\nThe application is absolutely free! (But there is some advertising in it, pure scientists need to be fed with something)
Continue
He\'s one hundred percent gay, he doesn\'t even need a test.\n\nOh are you here? Go back to the test area, damn boy!
Next
Finish
Test passed!

Honestly, we are very surprised with the result, because you are only %d%% gay! One of the scientists bet his car that you like boys! Now the poor man will be beaten at home by his wife, but you can be proud (if you are satisfied), you are definitely not a gay!\n

In fact, you were very close to be alleged a gay, because you are %d%% gay. A bit more and you could dress up and walk at the gay parade or just start looking for a boyfriend, but no! We don\'t think you\'re a gay, bro!\n

Scientists had been arguing for a long time, someone even started fighting, but the decision was made! You are %d%% gay! If this result upsets you, don\'t worry, buy heels and pink clothes, do a makeup and be yourself!\n

When we analyzed your responses, we were not a bit surprised, because the result is obvious. You are %d%% gay! You are so gay that you may already start painting your nails, as far as this is your destiny!\n

Scientists can finally relax and return home to their families, because inventing questions was not so easy)\n If you liked the app, rate it or share the result with your friends, this way you can find out whether your friends are those who they seem to be!\n

Scientists can finally relax and return home to their families, because inventing questions was not so easy)
 If you liked the app, rate it or share the result with your friends, this way you can find out whether your friends are those who they seem to be!
 If you want more tests like this one, support the scientists and their families, this way you will help to speed up the scientific process (%s) :) Good luck!
Take test again
Another tests
Feed scientists

I passed a gay test with this result:
%s
Any guesses about YOUR result?)

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.funnygaytest
OOps
You need an Internet connection to use this app. Check your connection and try again
OK
Please select an answer before proceeding further
What do you think, if we were in the Middle Ages, what will be your occupation?
Pied Piper
Whipping boy
Penguin flipper
Chimney sweep
Which vegetable from the following list do you like the most?
Cucumber
Aubergine
Carrot
It doesn\'t matter, the main things are shape and size!

Imagine the situation. You came to the meeting with two friends. One of them is a guy and the other one is a girl. At the same moment the guy is stretching out his hand to greet you, and the girl is going to hug you. Who you will response first and why?
The guy will be the first because any guy is more important for me than a girl.
The guy will be the first, and I will not shake his hand, but hug him!
The guy will be the first because I like boys more.
Hey scientists! May I have some normal options? I\'m not a gay damn you!

Imagine the situation. You are walking down the street with your friend (female), and several guys appeared in front of you and are up to block your way. You realise that nothing good will happen, your actions?
Remember what you were taught at physical education classes and run without looking back
Probably if you cry loudly, they will not hit you hard, and if you wet yourself, they are unlikely to touch you at all
Start praying to God loudly, there is a chance that they will not beat a religious person and immediately will start to pester the girl
There is no chance to save a girl in this situation, so it would be wise to pretend a pimp, there is a slight possibility to benefit from the situation
How many male sexual partners did you have?
Didn\'t count
One
Shall I count a hand?
Many
Why do you think there is no normal option in the answers?
Because the scientists who created this are crazy
Because normal answers are boring!
Because scientists are hinting, since I downloaded this test, the likelihood that I am gay is high
All of the above
Imagine the situation. You were asked to change into women\'s clothing and take a couple of photos. You will be paid 1000$ for this. Will you agree?
For 1000$ in cash I can do more than that
Sometimes I do it for free, so why not
1000$? Where have you been earlier? I agreed on this for a bottle of beer once
What from the following variants would you like to do more?
Rhythmic gymnastics
Figure skating
Ballet
Belly dance
Do you remember the question of what will you do if several guys appeared in front of you and your female friend? So I\'ll give you one more chance to answer, because your previous answer was wrong
In a stress situation, you need to think quickly, so you will start shouting to the whole street Allah Akbar and take something out of your pocket, pretending that it is a detonator
Saying that your mommy won\'t let you hang out with strangers. And after they start dragging your girlfriend into the car, tell her not to take candy from the bandits
You will be beaten anyway, so why not hit your girlfriend first, probably they will decide that you are insane and leave you alone
Which of the following do you think best describes you?
I\'m constantly exercising and staying in a good physical fit. Also I don\'t mind trying a thong
I\'m an outstanding person and always in the spotlight. Especially I like to chat about guys with my friends.
I\'m reasonable person and always ready to listen. I really like to hug and comfort my friends, especially guys
I\'m not a gay, look at yourself, scientists! (This answer is incorrect, but you may try to choose it)
What do you think a gay person thinks about in the morning?
How should I know?? I\'m not a gay
I\'m not a gay, but for sure which tights to wear today
Of course I have no idea, but probably about the guys
I think I\'m starting to realize that the more I deny that I am gay, the more likely it is that you will write in a result that I am a latent gay
Do you have gay friends?
Yes, I am not against such people in my social circle
Yes, basically only such people surround me
Yes, I often call my friends gay, probably some of them really are
Yes, also I think \"tell me whom you make friends with and I will tell you who you are\"
Imagine the situation. Life has been developed in such a way that you have to share a room with a friend gay. And you have got to the point that he offers you sexual intimacy, your actions?
Just once doesn\'t mean I\'m going to become a gay, right?
I would agree, just ask to do it quickly
Of course, I would agree, eventually we are friends.
Only if he\'s in front
Imagine the situation. You are on a desert island and you are given a set of three things to survive. Which set of the following will you choose?
Tent, medical kit, bagful of long cucumbers
Lighter, flare, lipstick
Warm clothes set, canister of drinking water, nail polish
Food for the week, shotgun with cartridges, pink dress
By the way, I forgot to ask, how do you feel about heterosexuals?
Naturally positive
Naturally negative
Everyone has their own way, I don\'t care
What kind of girls do you like?
Have never thought about it..At least alive and that\'s good
I don\'t like girls that much, guys are more interesting

Smart, beautiful, slim, generous, ready to do anything for me, cooks deliciously, tall, modest, does not drink alcohol, does not smoke. This is only part of the criteria, but it will work for a start.
If you were not born a human, who would you be?
Racoon
Blob fish
Chimpanzee
Dolphin
Imagine the situation. You are not gay, how are you going to live on?
Don\'t say that, I can\'t stand it!
Well, girls will do too, I basically don\'t care, the main thing is a mutual respect and warmth
I have a shop nearby that sells soap and rope, I think I\'ll go there to buy it
And let\'s imagine that you are not gays, scientists. How will you then come up with such questions?? (This answer is not correct, but you may try to choose it)
How do you feel about a fight on the street if your honor is at stake?
I will try to solve the problem peacefully, because only recently has the manicure refreshed.
I will not get into a fight, because I do not want to be beaten, and then also pissed on my face
I am afraid of fights, once my granny beat me with a stick, after that I\'m avoiding conflicts
Fights for Neanderthals, I will pay a person as much as he wants, the main thing is not to beat me
Are you an emotional person? Is it easy to bring you to tears?
I\'m crying every day because life is cruel
I\'m very emotional, I\'m breaking into tears already in the first minute of Hachiko\'s move
I was crying constantly during the first 15 years of my life, because in this country my sexual orientation is hard to live with
How often do you and your friends are joking about homosexuality?
I have no friends, and I often joke with myself, although I\'m not sure that it is a joke at all.
We used to joke about this, but once my buddies became more than friends. It turned out as a funny joke
We constantly discuss this topic and try to engage more and more people into this.
Often. And lately we also started to compete whose penis is larger
How do you feel about your body hair?
I shave all my body hair wherever it is!
I don\'t have hair on my body, I did a full body depilation
I don\'t have body hair like my two dads
I believe that shaving body hair is a sin, so I look like Chewbacca
Imagine the situation. You share a room with a friend. One day you enter the room and he is watching a gay porn and jerks off. What are you going to do in this a situation?
I\'ll help him, we are still friends
I\'ll tell him that I have just watched exactly the same video
What a shame, I told my boyfriend not to post this video on the Internet!
What a shame, every time he starts watching it without me!
And the last question. Did do you like the test?)
These scientists are absolutely crazy. So I didn\'t like it
Thanks for the test, I learned a lot about myself
Not a bad test, but I don\'t think I will be happy with the result
